column4: hello, i'm trying to get Joint Operations: Typhoon rising to run in wine, but it keeps kicking back a network problem. "An error has occurred attemting to connect to the network system. You may not have enough RAM or you may of some NETWORK SOCKETS blocked. Make sure you are not running other network applications that may take thes resources away. You can reconfigure what sockets this game uses by editing game.cfg. Look for mpgatese
my router firewall is off. any ideas?
I've been trying that for a while.. with no luck.. have you checked out the winehq site?  I don't think they list that program at all
its there, but don't know if it was ever fixed
how did they rate it.. gold, silver, "fo-get-a-bout-it"
it was rated bronze in gutsy
installed fine for me, updated fine
*sigh* i loved the game when i played it back in HS
yep.. I've got it installed on my windows half.. haven't had time in the last 2 months to login though. for quick shoot-em-ups I go to alien arena now.
im gonna have to google that
know of any military type that are bit like JO?
also look at Nexuiz, OpenArena, AssaultCube etc..  JO is like AssaultCube and AmericanArmy
i love you right now. *hands Scunizi a beer*
thanks again. gonna log off of here and go play one of the games...look for me when i headshot. =)
